items.item:
Getting the name of a type doesn't seem to be working anymore. See tests/fib.R. Is this just for basic types?
getTypeKind(fib$returnType) == CXType_Int
Add finalizers, e.g. disposeTranslationUnit Have to worry about holding elements belonging to it, e.g. cursors.
If we can't create the TU, get an error message. The -Xclang doesn't work anymore.
If the visitor function doesn't return an integer, do it for them. Can try to coerce, but probably not a great idea.
